name: Salt Oil
description: Fior di Sale comes from the salt plains of Tripani, where the wind blowing over the plains crystallizes the salt, which is then harvested manually. With lemon and peppermint essential oils, add this Fior di Sale to meat, fish, or vegetable dishes after cooking. Savor the fresh scent as you experiment with new combinations.
details: Has a cooling effect and is refreshing and uplifting.
Sea Salt has long been known for its healing and clearing effects, flushing out impurities and clarifying your skin.
Fabulous for feet, elbows, backs and hands.

name: Kaya - Hexagonal pendant from colored pencils
description: Take a step into the world of colors and imagination with Matitta Kayu jewelry.Handcrafted hexagonal pendant made of Koh-I-Noor colored pencils.
details: All accessories are from 925 sterling silver which will promise a lasting shine.
Pendant is approx 6 cm height, 5 cm width and 7 mm thickness.
Necklace cord is about 70 cm long and 4 mm thickness.
The product comes with a beautiful handmade wooden box and can be the perfect gift.
The color may be slightly different from the picture because of different display device.
